list.title: App.tsx
list.description: Main application component with routing setup

list.title: CarouselImage
list.description:
A carousel component that displays product images with animated transitions.
Features include:
- Next/Previous navigation buttons
- Smooth slide animations
- Responsive image display
- Keyboard navigation support

list.title: ProductDescription
list.description: Renders the product header section with company name, product title and description

list.title: ProductPrice
list.description: Renders product price information including current price, discount, and original price

list.title: ProductQuantity
list.description: Renders a quantity selector with increase/decrease buttons and current quantity display

list.title: ProductTemplate
list.description: Renders the main product page layout including carousel, description, price, quantity selector and add to cart button

list.title: components/molecules/CarouselImage.tsx
list.description: Image carousel component with next/previous navigation and animations

list.title: components/molecules/ProductDescription.tsx
list.description: Component for displaying product header information including company name, title, and description.

list.title: components/molecules/ProductPrice.tsx
list.description: Component for displaying product price information including current price, discount, and original price.

list.title: components/molecules/ProductQuantity.tsx
list.description: Component for managing product quantity selection with increment/decrement controls.

list.title: components/pages/Documentation.tsx
list.description: Component for displaying the JSDoc documentation within the app

list.title: components/template/ProductTemplate.tsx
list.description: Template component for the product page layout
